fu.gps

Class GPSPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.gps.GPSPosition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GPSMeasurement

    public class GPSPosition
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    GPSPosition read the content of strings/substrings to make the contens usual for seperate action, to return the latitude, longitude and altitude coordinations
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • GPSPosition

        public GPSPosition(java.lang.String latitude,
           java.lang.String ns_indicator,
           java.lang.String longitude,
           java.lang.String ew_indicator,
           java.lang.String altitude_s,
           java.lang.String unit)
            throws GPSDecoderException
        Konstructor initzialisates a new object of the class
        Parameters:
        latitude - includes the degrees minutes and seconds of the latitude coordinates
        ns_indicator - includes the north and south coordinate
        longitude - includes the degrees minutes and seconds of the longitude coordinates
        ew_indicator - includes the east and west coordinate
        altitude - includes the altitude value
        unit - inclutes the meeters, yards or foots etc.
        Throws:
        GPSDecoderException
